website_summaries.verdict: Young children will love the cute chihuahua toy that barks and walks. Entertains both kids and small dogs alike.
pros: Some customers report using this as a toy for their small dogs
Small size of toy works great for small children
Kids enjoy playing with this toy for months
cons: Some parents dislike the shrill noises and yaps from the toy
School-age children will not find much appeal with this dog

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for 5 month old twin grand daughters they love to look at the puppy and keep smiling
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I bought this for 5 month old twin grand daughters they love to look at the puppy and keep smiling ::)) Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy
customer_reviews.text: Best fun ever. Our chihuahua and this little guy had it out. Once we put the batteries in it was all fun.
customer_reviews.author: Estelita Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy my dogs have enjoyed trying to kill for the last few months:)
customer_reviews.text: Provided us and my chihuahua tons or entertainment. The incessant barking works a nerve pretty quick which may be why my dog has been trying to destroy it from day one but it still stays barking while I hear her crunching the plastic head. It also no longer has eyes or a nose and is pretty beat up, still won't stfu up though with the yapping!
customer_reviews.author: S.Robbins

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old nephew was scared of it, but our 2 dogs think it’s funny and they chase it!! He walks good on our thin living room carpet but not our thicker bedroom carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom&Welder

customer_reviews.title: WHY do I get these things for my kitty?
customer_reviews.text: Ok, while this toy is cute as can be, works great, and has been carried around, dropped and fought with by my kitty Leela..the noise..if you have noise sensitive upstairs neighbors, either don’t purchase this or certainly DON’T turn it on when they are home! If your child..or cat in my case, can figure out how to turn it on? Either keep it hidden or find one that doesn’t have a constant hi-pitched yap...believe me, your personal sanity could be at risk. Other than that? Leela is absolutely thrilled with her new “friend”; but is currently ignoring me, having a kitty-tantrum, until my anti-anxiety supplements kick in..
customer_reviews.author: SoloPoconoTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: My puppy thinks it's alive!
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny but so is my pup. She's fascinated by the sounds and movements. It's obviously not designed as a puppy chew toy but when she's supervised, I have no problem with her pouncing on it and carrying it around. She thinks it's a new friend that's come over for a play date.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McR

customer_reviews.title: Really adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little thing with a funny little puppy squeak. He hops and barks at the same time. Very cute. My dogs are ShihTzus....one of them loves this little guy and tries to carry him to her area to inspect him, but I'm afraid she might hurt him. The other one flees the room to hide whenever she hears him squeaking. Still funny.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service...sent wrong dog.
customer_reviews.text: Received a dog that looked nothing like the one in the description, no box, no bag...just the dog. It was so ugly and didn't even work all that well. I was gonna return it but at my cost...NO WAY, it wasn't worth me putting more money into it. I do NOT recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Mabie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughter for Christmas. The battery compartment was not right. One side had no post for the positive to connect and the other side had no spring to keep battery tight. I was able to put folded aluminum foil in to make it work. Adorable when it works. DO NOT BUY, PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne L. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: So, these are the little guys that get sold on malls all over the place. If you have small children you could understand why kids get attracted to this item. Well, anywhere you go is about $20-$25 bucks, I got it here on Amazon for $10. You can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Abstract Blind

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Loud
customer_reviews.text: It works and my daughter likes it. I on the other hand hate it because it's so loud and obnoxious. If it wasn't so loud I could tolerate it. They really should have made it with two volume levels.
customer_reviews.author: BubbaMack

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss with this toy. My Chihuahua loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't miss with this toy. My Chihuahua loves this little companion. It keeps him entertained for hours. The one I purchased about 2 years ago had to be disposed of. Bruno roughed it up so much it had to go. The toy endured wrestling, chewing, and being drug around the back yard, as well as many washings over the past two years. Point to note....The electronics did not survive the washings. m
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4yo loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4yo told us days before Christmas she wanted a robotic dog. (We didn't even know she'd ever seen one!) We found this one and comores to others for price and review. She LOVES it and is pretty hard on it. It still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Zelnik

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves it a lot! It is so cute and keeps my 10 month son busy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F Clark

customer_reviews.title: Non-stop noise
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 year old nephew loves this, but wow is it annoying. It doesn't stop yapping the whole time it's on. It would have been nice if there was a silent mode, where the dog moves but doesn't bark, or even if there were longer pauses in between barks.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, loud, and gets extremely annoying after 5 minutes of use. Good thing my 9 month loses interest within 5 minutes so I can shut it off and off to the next toy
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Kept my dogs endlessly amused
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a “distraction” to keep our dogs facing the camera for a Christmas photo. Worked like a charm. Product works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Siggygal

customer_reviews.title: The size of the dog is perfect for my daughter to take it everywhere with her ...
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing ever!! My two year old loves it. It barks, shakes its tail, and walks. The size of the dog is perfect for my daughter to take it everywhere with her too. Birthdays are coming up and going to get few for my friends' 2 year old kids!
customer_reviews.author: MommyLin

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for a dog
customer_reviews.text: This toy arrived as promised and when promised. We bought it for our Pomeranian and he promptly chewed the nose off, the only small piece that he could pry off. It repeatedly yip-yips, waddles forward an inch or two, and is generally either mesmerizing or annoying, depending on whether you're the owner or your dog. All in all, a great toy to occupy your dog and amuse yourself. I suppose it would be fun for a toddler, too, though I can't imagine any parent could stand to listen to the high-pitched yipping for very long.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and works great.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was given this a month ago and she has taken it with her all over town - even sending it solo down slides at the park. I am amazed that it still works but it does. Walks and yaps like a real Chihuahua. The yapping can get irritating. It would be nice if it yapped less. We ordered the lil kitty by the same company and found it amusing that it has the exact same inside... in other words the lil kitty walks and yaps just like the Chihuahua... the lil kitty will not get a five star review.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lines

customer_reviews.title: Totally fun, but not good for dogs who might eat it~
customer_reviews.text: Really cute for entertainment purposes.....My dogs watch it move around, and then ignore it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It Barks and Walks A Lot!
customer_reviews.text: It is cute. However, it barks non-stop. It is annoying to adults, but perfect for three and four-year-olds.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyed Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very loud)
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good toy, but extremely loud. The child loves it, although it’s cost should be like $3.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Graves

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but fragile
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked it a lot , but I think it wouldn’t last beyond few months . Kind of fragile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Four year old loves it. Unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Four year old loves it. Unfortunately she stepped on one of its legs and broke the leg, but it's still going on 3 legs.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Chi Chi
customer_reviews.text: He's so cute... My granddaughter is going to love him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOY
customer_reviews.text: WAS PURCHASED AS GIFT FOR 1 YEAR OLD GREAT NEPHEW. KID WAS DELIGHTED. GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT SHIPPING/DELIVERY
customer_reviews.author: john birkenheier

customer_reviews.title: ... twin grandsons - I have small dogs and they love them (dogs love kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 1 of my twin grandsons - I have small dogs and they love them (dogs love kids, kids love dogs). Kids also love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Park

customer_reviews.title: Cute safe dog
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought! Bought for soon to be year old boy who loves all animals. He absolutely loves it! Smiles, laughs and goes crazy when it walks and barks. The downside is the constant ‘yips’ can get to you after a bit but though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Chi-Chi please be quiet!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -My son (15 month old) loved the yapping puppy The Bad: - Me & my wife found it annoying as heck. - Would randomly shut off/switch slid to off position - DOES NOT POUNCE. it is advertised that it pounces sum: it yips for about 7 seconds, walks 3-4 steps, repeat. I feel like it yips to long & walks to short. Where is the pouncing i was promised?
customer_reviews.author: Gambit

customer_reviews.title: Very good toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift. It barks and walks. Not loud and annoying. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Foxy

customer_reviews.title: Its not like the toy animals that only do things when you ...
customer_reviews.text: if it's on...it won't stop. Its not like the toy animals that only do things when you pat it's back. it just keeps going and going and going.......
customer_reviews.author: Betbutton

customer_reviews.title: Ohh...It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine and it's new , not used like some other people were saying. It looks cool I suppose but the bark is just okay. It think it should chirp a little louder and walk a little faster perhaps. My dogs didn't have much time to play with it because my mother snatched it up and said it was hers. Also , i'm sure this little toy can be bought at a swap meet or flea market for around $5.. .
customer_reviews.author: K. Quaintance

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Another cute toy that I bought for my cats and they hate. Benefit to the kids though. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: grandma lyn

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua has a new friend.
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua has now adopted it as his own. Haha!! He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: This is the cutest toy ever. My little chihuahua ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest toy ever. My little chihuahua is scared of him (we named him Taquito), but she also likes to 'fight' him. We all get a kick out of this little dog.
customer_reviews.author: Storee L. Powell

customer_reviews.title: The fabric around the nose was separating upon arrival and ...
customer_reviews.text: The fabric around the nose was separating upon arrival and the dog stopped barking within the first hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bonano

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are not included
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandson and he loves it. He is very young so doesn't play carefully. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Denise MCCORMICK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too noisy. Constant barking no relief until you shut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love it for a gift... son reads skippy John Jones and has to have this!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cute, silly, kinda loud
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, it's a bday gift for later this week. Put batteries in it to make sure it works. It's smaller than I expected but that is actually a good thing, it's a great size for a little girl. My only concern is it's yippy bark....it could get quite annoying after awhile
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my mom who recently lost her dog, she loved it. Super cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nimsy

customer_reviews.title: barks adorably. The "pounce" could stand to be more pronounced ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute mechanical toy, barks adorably. The "pounce" could stand to be more pronounced from the basic dog trot. Was a gift for a coworker who wants a real dog but not allowed in her apartment. She seems to like Chi Chi.
customer_reviews.author: A. Luff

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price, I can't afford a real dog, so I chose this instead. I take Caramel on walks, and I also bought a little bed for the pup. Does not need to go potty, and it's quiet when turned off. Helped me lift my smile to greater heights.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: charming
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, inexpensive, and is full of charm. It barks, and walks. It is tiny just like a Chihuahua and made a nice hit as a gift for a small girl who wanted a dog.
customer_reviews.author: janetO

customer_reviews.title: the next best thing to a dog!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old girl LOVES dogs. Since there's no way we're getting an actual dog, I scoured the internet for an inexpensive solution. I finally narrowed it down to Chi Chi Chihuahua and my daughter loves it. The on and off switch is easy enough for my daughter to use, and although the constant yipping can get irritating at times, it was definitely worth the purchase. I just might get the Labradoodle as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Little Dog
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. My 7 year old daughter is crazy about this dog. It is so cute and not at all annoying. She keeps it in her room and lets it walk down the hallway and around house. It really is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: L. Reid

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old daughter loves it!!! .....but as for me and my wife the barking can be pretty annoying after prolonged use LoL.
customer_reviews.author: stnoel

customer_reviews.title: Little buddy for my DOG!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I did purchase this for my dog, not a kid. I have a little maltese and he loves any toys that make noise. The easiest way to describe the game: Shake and Kill Chi Chi the Chihuahua. He is always supervised when he plays, but he did manage to pull the nose out of the dog. Now he just runs around the apartment shaking the thing in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, don’t expect it to last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this. It’s much smaller than I expected, and it looks pretty fragile. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Only on or off.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter adored this thing but it barks non stop...it ended up having to "dissapear". It is either on or off, doesn't wait till you pet it or anything. Really sad it was so loud and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog/ok
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. My son played with it for 2 days and then never again. The barking got a little annoying. It does function how it says (barks and walks). Its a very nice toy, but perhaps not for children over 3 as they may get bored fast. I was very pleased with the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ms TiffaniXOXO

customer_reviews.title: VERY cute
customer_reviews.text: So so cute. Got this for my granddaughter and she loves it too. She is 18 months old. Not sure how long it will last with the way a baby can handle it but time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Doggy
customer_reviews.text: M grands love this! They are 7 & 4. They played with it daily and, as little ones do, soon lost interest. This doggie is smaller than we thought.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute toy. My chi loved playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying toy WHEN it works.  Quit working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toy for my 2-year-old's birthday gift, and instantly regretted it. Super annoying sound that just keeps going on and on until you flip the switch to shut it off. Very repetitive, did not hold her interest. Then after only 2 months it completely quit working. Definite waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: epeterson22

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Bark and 1 Leg Was Broke When Received
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted a puppy toy for Christmas so I chose this one. When I put the batteries in and turned it on one of the legs wouldn't move and it does not bark. It makes a mechanical yelping noise (nothing similar to a dog noise). My daughter accidently dropped it and now 2 of the legs don't move. She loves it and cuddles with it every night because its what she wanted. I'm not very satisfied with it but she is. I guess that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: ReRe

customer_reviews.title: ” This is one of if not her favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my puppy & she LOVES her “baby.” This is one of if not her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It is alright, but to big for my Chihuahua...he still likes it though...
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua likes this, but it is to big for him, though he will drag it over to his bed and chew on it for a while.... He does not like the barking though or really the movements....
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little toy is very entertaining for my son and my daughter. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog
customer_reviews.text: Very first time my baby 10 months now, saw this toy, he couldnt stop laughing and playing with it...
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Nice puppy toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes toy so much. It’s very durable and cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar Dudhatra

customer_reviews.title: Construction of legs seems frail
customer_reviews.text: This toy is cute and apparently looks real enough to fool dogs, judging from the reaction of mine when they saw it. I bought it for my nephew as a Christmas present and he seems to like it. The main flaw I've found is that the legs seem to be frail and the fabric isn't attached properly to them so it tends to shift and create a wrinkled appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Buyer

customer_reviews.title: One of the cutest Mechanical Dog!
customer_reviews.text: This little tyke walks, sits and yelps when on. It's so cute, your kids will want to take him everywhere. We used this chi-chi for halloween in Dorthy's basket & for a kids fashion show as a prop in the basket down the runway-everyone loved him sooo because he's sooo CUTE! Hope this review helped.
customer_reviews.author: JohnQpublic

customer_reviews.title: They don't even turn them on to walk or bark like they can
customer_reviews.text: My kids adore these months and months and months after receiving them for last Christmas. They don't even turn them on to walk or bark like they can, they just adore how cute they are and these little dogs travel throughout my house constantly, much more so than any of their other (abundant) stuffed dog toys
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barking Chi
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute and it walks and barks like it's supposed to. I bought it to add to a few other toys I have for when my little nephews/nieces come over. I hate the battery compartment with the tiny screw that's hard to open - thus the 4-star review instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: It ended up being one of her favorite Christmas Presents
customer_reviews.text: I found this item when looking for another product for my Grand Daughter. It was so cute and so reasonably priced that I had to get it for her. It ended up being one of her favorite Christmas Presents! It's small enough that she takes it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Affordable purchase.
customer_reviews.text: If you child wants a dog and you don't want to buy the real thing, this is a great gift. It walks and barks and can be thrown into a closet when your child is bored with it. Even better, you don't have to worry that it will starve.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F. Montz

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves it, but smaller batteries pose risks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this little toy. It keeps him busy during feeding time and it's also funny to look at. I don't like that these new toys are coming with the smaller batteries (button batteries) that can be swallowed by infants/kids. How much cheaper is it to use those small batteries vs the AAA?
customer_reviews.author: KaTaHaR

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as an animated obstacle in a home-made indoor mini golf course. It was a big hit. Using this and the weasel ball and the happy hamster ball on the last hole of the course made it extra special and very challenging.
customer_reviews.author: vlvwt

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BUT TINY!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute but very small. We bought all of the breeds for our grandkids and the lot of them made a fun event!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Clark Browne

customer_reviews.title: I am a child at heart) and we both love it.
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!! I bought one for my grandson and one for myself (yup, I am a child at heart) and we both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It was cute,but two legs broke after 2 to 3 weeks. It wasn't played with roughly as it was for a 9 year old girl. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kathy wagner

customer_reviews.title: My Great Grandaughter was enchanted with this walking
customer_reviews.text: My Great Grandaughter was enchanted with this walking, barking toy. So much so that she slept with it Christmas night. I'm so glad I bought it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Broken. Shipped with no barking sound.
customer_reviews.text: It’s as expected and in fact very cute. However, mine has NO barking sound. I assume it is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kim

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, Used Toy, not suitable for sale
customer_reviews.text: This product was subpar on every level. It came poorly packaged, and the item appears to have been previously used. The nose on the dog had scuffs, the footpads were dirty, the actual mechanism that allows the toy to walk was broken, as was his voicebox. All in all a horrible product with no response from the seller when I let them know.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Dog
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Doesn’t really bark more like yips
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mansell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: poor quality, works fine until child plays with it, then it breaks like an eggshell.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good material and working fine
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Loud noise. Tuff. My kids are having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Aat

customer_reviews.title: Chi-Chi is a win
customer_reviews.text: A toy to keep my puppy busy and IT WORKED! Kept my lab puppy entertained for long periods of time. Durable and not too annoying on the loudness of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: PHA

customer_reviews.title: Chi-Chi was an instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my niece who basically stopped opening all other giifts just to play with this one. Great gift for a child, but watch out - your dog will go nuts if they see/hear Chi-Chi. (Which I personally thought was funny.)
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty ShutterBug

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $19.00 for this toy and it is not worth it. I just took it out of the plastic wrapper and there is a stain on both ears and down the back. The nose is also crooked. I bought this for my little granddaughter for Christmas. Amazon usually carries good quality merchandise but this one is very poor. Stay away from this product and spend your money on something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: jdbuck

customer_reviews.title: Check to see if it works first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas found out today it doesn't work. Out of the return window so I'm stuck with a broken toy
customer_reviews.author: kadie ortega

customer_reviews.title: my baby loved it when the dog walked
customer_reviews.text: after my baby played with this for a month, it broke. This Chi-Chi CHIhuahua could not walk anymore. maybe my baby is too strong? my baby loved it when the dog walked.
customer_reviews.author: NK1010

customer_reviews.title: Desk Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could pretend to have my chihuahua with me at work. It has been successful in annoying those around me in the best way possible. Recommended for those who enjoy quirky things and puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. It's a very laude toy its stop only if you do it and it stop working after a week. I would be very happy to returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son's favorite dogs are Chihuahuas I bought him this because I thought he'd get a kick out of it. He loved it. Chi-Chi is so cute. My real dog thought he was great fun too. Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: E.E

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought thus for my grandson and he loved it! It's a little on the small size but its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dell

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift. Hope she like it ? Don't know anything about what it does. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Amishvisitor

customer_reviews.title: Chi Chi Stocking Stuffer 2014
customer_reviews.text: Chi Chi has arrived at my home as a stocking stuffer for my granddaughter. He looks so cute and I know she'll love play9ing with him.
customer_reviews.author: Eilean Du

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and small. My one year old loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old is playful and feels like having fun with a real puppy
customer_reviews.text: Cute. My son loves it. I avoid keeping a dog at home due to excessive care and hygiene. My 3 year old is playful and feels like having fun with a real puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Sapna J

customer_reviews.title: This dog it great! It was a gift for my 16 month ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This dog it great! It was a gift for my 16 month old. He loves dogs and was absolutely thrilled when he got this and saw that he walks, wags his tail AND barks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni P

customer_reviews.title: Dog not happy
customer_reviews.text: My Mom bought this for my small pooch and the dog was scared of the toy. So even though the humans liked the toy, my pooch did not.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small and barking doesn't sounds like barking... but besides that my niece love the little dog!!
customer_reviews.author: kary

customer_reviews.title: as the dog was by then bored with it
customer_reviews.text: This was kind of cute ... but by the day after Christmas, it was just another item to be donated, as the dog was by then bored with it.
customer_reviews.author: rubyslippers46

customer_reviews.title: rc chi dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a,very cute Remote control.chi dog Who walks and thanks for great price and delivery
customer_reviews.author: pamela banks

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but annoying
customer_reviews.text: It had a good price, and was a cute toy. But it was pretty annoying. The barks were high pitched squeaks, with no volume button. Looks: 5 stars Sounds: 2 stars Price:4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of returning this item. The dog is adorable as far as looks go but does not do anything! It doesn't do the things the description said. I mean, absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Pressley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little guy doesn't flip like the old school ones.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty OG

product_meta.title: Westminster Chi-Chi Chihuahua
product_meta.description:
Cute little chihuahua (chi chi) walks ahead, nods tail, wags playfully and pounces.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This cuddly Chi-Chi Chihuahua will be your new best friend. The cute Chi-Chi walks, Nods its head, Wags its tail and playfully pounces.
feature_bullets: Adorable Chi-Chi Chihuahua is adorned with a calico bandana
Chi-Chi Walks, Head Nods, Tail Wags and Playfully Pounces
